name: Farm Game in Unity Course project
name_original: Farm Game in Unity Course project
description:
Project that I will be explaining in my upcoming video course: 2D Farm game in Unity 

https://courses.sunnyvalleystudio.com/p/2d-farm-game-in-unity-2022 (early access will start in the next few days - end of March 2023)

Pixel art: Super Retro World series by Gif https://gif-superretroworld.itch.io/ 

Overview video:


Controls:

Use WSAD to move.

Spacebar = interact.

I = inventory

Q = swapping equipped tool

You can interact with chests / bed and the shop keeper. Use tools on the field.

Collect your tools here:

Farming tutorial:

Wilt crops can be removed using HAND or HOE tools.
